name: user_daily_activity_summary
description: The summary of each user's daily activities, extracted from the integrated log data.

columns.name: user
columns.description: The unique identifier of a user.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date of the activity summary.

columns.name: workingday
columns.description: Whether the date is a working day or not.

columns.name: numlogonDay
columns.description: The number of times a user logged on to the system.

columns.name: numlogoffDay
columns.description: The number of times a user logged off from the system.

columns.name: numfileDay
columns.description: The number of files a user accessed or modified.

columns.name: numdeviceDay
columns.description: The number of devices a user connected to the system.

columns.name: numemailDay
columns.description: The number of e-mails a user sent or received.
